channel.title: Comments on: Photoshop On An Etch A Sketch

item.title: By: Pammy
item.dc:creator: Pammy
item.description: Haha! I just forwarded that to everyone in the creative department at work. It's funny bc my boss has an etch-a-sketch in his office that people always draw stuff on.
item.content:encoded: Haha! I just forwarded that to everyone in the creative department at work. It’s funny bc my boss has an etch-a-sketch in his office that people always draw stuff on.

item.title: By: Etchasketchist
item.dc:creator: Etchasketchist
item.description: I'm a blogger. You're a blogger. We have exactly the same amount of free time. You type words and stuff. I draw on my etch-a-sketch. That's the only difference.
item.content:encoded: I’m a blogger. You’re a blogger. We have exactly the same amount of free time. You type words and stuff. I draw on my etch-a-sketch. That’s the only difference.
